verses.verse: Christ <WG5547> Then <WG3767> Having Suffered <WG3958> For <WG5228> Us <WG2257> In The Flesh, <WG4561> Also <WG2532> Ye <WG5210> The <WG3588> Same <WG846> Mind <WG1771> Arm Yourselves With; <WG3695> For <WG3754> He That <WG3588> Suffered <WG3958> In The <WG1722> Flesh <WG4561> Has Done With <WG3973> Sin; <WG266>

<WG1519> <WG3588> No Longer <WG3371> Men's <WG444> To Lusts, <WG1939> But <WG235> To Will <WG2307> God's <WG2316> The <WG3588> Remaining <WG1954> In The <WG1722> Flesh <WG4561> To Live <WG980> Time. <WG5550>

<WG1722> Wherein <WG3739> They Think It Strange <WG3579> Not <WG3361> Running With Them <WG4936> Your <WG5216> To <WG1519> The <WG3588> Same <WG846> <WG3588> Of Dissoluteness <WG810> Overflow, <WG401> Speaking Evil Of You ; <WG987>
Who <WG3739> Shall Render <WG591> Account <WG3056> To Him <WG3588> Ready <WG2093> Who Is <WG2192> To Judge The <WG2919> Living <WG2198> And The <WG2532> Dead. <WG3498>

<WG1519> <WG5124> For To This End <WG1063> Also <WG2532> To The Dead <WG3498> Were The Glad Tidings Announced, <WG2097> That <WG2443> They Might Be Judged <WG2919> Indeed <WG3303> As Regards <WG2596> Men <WG444> In The Flesh; <WG4561> <WG2198> But Might Live <WG1161> As Regards <WG2596> God <WG2316> In The Spirit. <WG4151>

<WG3956> But Of All Things <WG1161> The <WG3588> End <WG5056> Has Drawn Near : <WG1448> Be Sober Minded <WG4993> Therefore, <WG3767> And <WG2532> Be Watchful <WG3525> Unto <WG1519> <WG3588> Prayers; <WG4335>

Before <WG4253> All Things <WG3956> But <WG1161> <WG3588> Among <WG1519> Yourselves <WG1438> Love <WG26> Fervent <WG1618> Having, <WG2192> Because <WG3754> Love <WG26> Will Cover <WG2572> A Multitude <WG4128> Of Sins; <WG266>
Hospitable <WG5382> To <WG1519> One Another, <WG240> Without <WG427> Murmurings; <WG1112>

Each <WG1538> According As <WG2531> He Received <WG2983> A Gift, <WG5486> To <WG1519> Each Other <WG1438> It <WG846> Serving, <WG1247> As <WG5613> Good <WG2570> Stewards <WG3623> Of The Various <WG4164> Grace <WG5485> Of God. <WG2316>
